segments.text: Can we talk about this bonus plan of yours ? I ’ Ve got a few problems with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Richard . What ’ s on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , to be honest , I just don ’ t think we ’ re going to have enough funds to give the kind of bonuses you have in mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , why don ’ t we sit down and work out the numbers ? We can always scale down the bonuses if we have to .
segments.speaker: S2
